text: Colobosauroides cearensis is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Northeast Brazil. ==References== Category:Colobosauroides Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1991 Category:Taxa named by Osvaldo Rodrigues da Cunha Category:Taxa named by José Santiago Lima-Verde Category:Taxa named by Almira Cláudia Marinho Lima
title: Colobosauroides cearensis
